item.title: Automate Performance Testing With JMeter and Github Actions
item.description: In this article I will demonstrate how you will integrate your JMeter with Github action. Setup JMeter script push jmeter script to github Publish html result

item.title: Set up Appium on macOS for Testing
item.description: Requirements A macOS machine where the Appium server will be running. The supported Appium version is 2.x (recommended), 1.x (1.22.3 is advised if you need to use version 1.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Experienced QA Automation Engineer excelling in Appium and Playwright for robust testing, I also bring seasoned security insights through Burp Suite and ZAP.
